title: Bodoni Be Regular
content: We need a font very simalar to Bodoni Be Reg. that can be used cross platform mac/pc. if anyone has any ideas that would be wonderful.
author: freelance

comments.content: Jake you need an open type format. Check with Adobe as they are leading the way with that format.

You might try [Adobe's Bauer Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.adobe.com/type/browser/P/P_1294.jhtml). It's OpenType and, while it's not ITC Bodoni, is a [Typophile Favorite®](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/16974.html)
Is it possible to purchase Bodoni Be regular anywhere? I need to purchase additional licenses of this font and I cannot find them.

I suppose you can at [Berthold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/BQ_library.html)'s website. Here's the links to   
 [Berthold Bodoni Antiqua](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90005.html) & [Expert](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90007.html) | [Berthold Bodoni Old Face + Expert](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203934/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90110.html)   
Unless I'm mistaken and the "Be" stands for something else?
